body: Going live from my backyard #BBQ! Tune in for some #grillingtips and good vibes! What’s everyone up to this weekend? #weekendvibes #food

comments.body: This is awesome! That grill looks! What are you cooking up?
@89898 Thanks! Got some burgers, chicken wings, and veggie skewers going. I’m trying a new marinade recipe for the wings!
Loving the live stream! What’s your secret to perfectly grilled burgers?
@56565 It’s all about getting the right sear! I cook them on high heat for a couple of minutes per side, then move them to indirect heat to finish. Juicy every time!
This looks so fun! Are you doing any side dishes, or is it all about the grill?
@67676 Got some potato salad and grilled corn on the side! Can’t have a BBQ without them.
The grill marks on those burgers are perfect! Any dessert plans after the grilling?
@45454 Haha, thanks! For dessert, we’re making s’mores by the fire pit later—keeping it classic!
Wish I was there! What’s your drink of choice for the BBQ?
@34343 A cold beer goes perfectly with BBQ, but we’ve also got some lemonade for the non-drinkers!
